ygData.subject: Re: purple and such
ygData.msgSnippet: I have personally tried that and found that as soon as you zone, you turn blue again. When I mentioned that to a guildmate, the told me that when you go into
ygData.messageBody:
I have personally tried that and found that as soon as you zone, you turn
blue again.

When I mentioned that to a guildmate, the told me that when you go into
options & go un-anon, everyone else sees you as blue, though you look purple
to yourself (similar to the HIDE bug).

So as far as I'm aware, there's no way a guild can play as roleplayers by
color (well, a couple workarounds, but the workarounds suck)

----- Original Message -----
From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
> Is your guild not aware that you can switch anonymous off? I was not
> pleased to find that invoking /roleplay also made me anonymous. Verant
> blindsided me with an unexpected side effect. So when turning on
/roleplay
> I simply try to remember to go to Options-General and turn anonymous back
off.
